entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 12:54 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNE 37 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
